Name: Mech Engineer
About the game: Mech Engineer – a dark sci-fi mech assembling manager with semi-auto battles against mutating, alien bio-weapon. The gameplay is focused on resource management and mech assembly. But you are able to give simple orders to the pilots. First . Assemble the heart of the Mech – reactor . Increase its power with components, while keeping temperature down. Terrain's temperature affects reactors to the point that, it can shut down them. Second . Then prepare your weapon. Customize rate of fire, weight, energy consumption, accuracy, and firepower. Different enemies require specific weapons. The rate of fire also changes the speed of spending ammunition. Third . When assembling mechs, the main thing to remember about limiting weight and available energy. The types of mechs differ from each other also in their adaptability to different terrain. Fourth . Sending mechs into battle will provide resources and open up new terrain for completing a global mission. It is important to control the route on the global map and track the probability of enemy bases on the cells. Good luck!
